a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Share of disease burden from communicable diseases vs. GDP per
Share of total disease burden from communicable, maternal, neonatal and nutritional diseases versus gross domestic product
(GDP) per capita, measured in constant international-$. Disease burden is measured based on Disability-Adjusted Life Years
Share of disease burden from communicable diseases
Data source: IHME, Global Burden of Disease (2024); World Bank (2023)
